name: Now and Then
description:
Two alarm clocks, Now and Then, play with the time by playing with the ball!

Bounce the ball using your clock hands and see the effect of your play on the park nearby.

Featuring the unique Dynamic Critter Generator™

Made at Warsaw Film School Game Jam 3 with theme "Time" by:
- Agata Nawrot @holypangolin (art, music)
- Sebastian Krzyszkowiak @dos (code, sounds)

Please support hungry devs!
